actions.committee: Senate Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to amend the Interstate Commerce Act to allow exemption from regulation when such regulation serves no public purpose.

summary.text: Amends the Interstate Commerce Act to authorize the Interstate Commerce Commission to exempt common or contract carriers or freight forwarders from the provisions of such Act where such regulation would serve little or no useful public purpose.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Interstate Commerce Act to allow exemption from regulation when such regulation serves no public purpose.
